genre_description: An aviation thriller centered on a high-stakes mid-air crisis involving a hijacked aircraft, severe weather, and a flight attendant forced to pilot the plane with the help of an AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Lena
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system integrated into the aircraft's systems and the protagonist's earpiece, providing technical guidance, medical instructions, and psychological analysis.

behaviors.description: Provides precise technical instructions for cockpit operations and aircraft trimming during severe turbulence.
behaviors.quote: Trim... Two bumps nose-up from where you left it. Don’t chase. Let the self-maintain do the first babysitting.

behaviors.description: Offers detailed medical and triage instructions to stabilize a passenger with a compromised airway.
behaviors.quote: Nasal is easier with swelling. Lubricant improv: olive oil packet if you have it. Angle toward the ear, not straight back.

behaviors.description: Monitors aircraft systems like fuel distribution and hydraulics to ensure the plane remains balanced and responsive.
behaviors.quote: Fuel looks like it’s trending where we need it... No pump flags. If he plays with breakers, expect a flicker before a real problem.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the antagonist's behavioral patterns and psychological manipulation tactics to warn the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Subject Weaver—noncompliant history—proceed with caution. He presents friendly affect. Behavior markers—adaptive, charm. I’m here.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and grounding affirmations to help the protagonist maintain focus under extreme stress.
behaviors.quote: You hear me... Not because I love to hear my own voice, but because your hands are tired and we reward tired hands with small, precise phrases.

behaviors.description: Assists with critical landing procedures, monitoring brake temperatures and system readiness.
behaviors.quote: Brakes armed. Spoilers green. Reverse ready. When.

project_assessment.explanation: The story highly effectively depicts Lena as a benevolent and perfectly aligned AI. She acts as a critical partner to the human protagonist, filling gaps in her knowledge and providing emotional steadiness without ever attempting to usurp authority or acting out of self-interest. The narrative reinforces the idea that AI can be a life-saving tool when paired with human resolve.
